name: Yume
description: A master marksman who trains every day without fail. Almost too serious and stubborn about things and not very sociable. Also known as the conversation ender because of her straight-forwardness and lack of understanding of popular culture.

passiveSkill.name: Marksman
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "The aura that drives the soul becomes a magic circle. When Yume is present, reduces all enemies' Rage regeneration by 20%  and increases her own DEF Penetration by 25%. Also increases DEF Penetration of allies by 25%."}

uniqueSkill.name: Arrow Dance
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Yume fires a rain of arrows to repel evil. Attacks a single enemy and deals DMG equal to {placeholder} of ATK, stealing 200 Rage from the target. If target has 0 Rage, then stuns the target for 1 round."}

specialSkill.name: Mighty Arrows
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "A precise magical attack. Yume attacks a single enemy and deals DMG equal to {placeholder} of ATK. Increases DEF Penetration by 15%.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Spirit Arrow
normalSkill.description: Yume fires an arrow that flies true. Attacks a single enemy and deals DMG equal to {placeholder} of ATK.

templateData.lens4.skill: Yume fires a rain of arrows to repel evil. Attacks a single enemy and deals DMG equal to {placeholder} of ATK, stealing 300 Rage from the target. If target has 0 Rage, then stuns the target for 1 round.
templateData.lens5.skill: The aura that drives the soul becomes a magic circle. When Yume is present, reduces all enemies' Rage regeneration by 20%  and increases her own DEF Penetration by 25%. Also increases DEF Penetration of allies by 25%.
templateData.lens6.skill: A precise magical attack. Yume attacks a single enemy and deals DMG equal to {placeholder} of ATK. Increases DEF Penetration by 15%.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
